ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableCardIc: Enable/disable clickable card icons in Sidebar Card Stacks
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableDispla: Enable/disable displaying cards when they are dealt.
Enable/disable displaying cards when they are passed.
Enable/disable displaying cards when they are drawn into a hand.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.whatDetermin: Select the logic that will determine which card face is initially shown on display. "Source stack determines face" means a card may display initially face-up or face-down based on how it is facing in its source stack. "Always face-up" makes all cards always render face-up regardless of any other settings you've selected. "Always face-down" likewise means cards will never render face-up or do a dramatic flip reveal, no matter what other settings you've configured.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableDramat: When a Deal action is performed, enable/disable showing the card(s) facedown at first, then dramatically flipping them over automatically after a brief pause.
When a Pass action is performed, enable/disable showing the card(s) facedown at first, then dramatically flipping them over automatically after a brief pause.
When a Draw action is performed, enable/disable showing the card(s) facedown at first, then dramatically flipping them over automatically after a brief pause.
Dramatic reveal on card icon click
On card icon clicks, enable/disable showing the card(s) facedown at first, then dramatically flipping them over automatically after a brief pause.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.enableWhispe: Enable/disable whispering card details to the DM on view.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.settings.defaultCardB: Configure the default border width on displayed cards.
Configure the default border color on displayed cards.
Configure the default card back image on images viewed as cards.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.notification.imagePat: Image URL or file path not provided.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.notification.deckNotF: No deck by that name was found.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.notification.cardIdNo: Please provide a card name or ID.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.notification.cardNotF: No card by that ID or name was found.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.notification.pileNotF: No pile found by the name "{pileName}". Creating a new discard pile by that name.
ORCNOG_CARD_VIEWER.ui.ignoreWordsInDeckN: the, thy, a, an, in, on, of, for, de, le, la, el, los, las, deck, cards, card
